SOULSTEAL.DESCRIPTION: The first time this monster attacks you on each of their turns, it gives you a buff. NL Human: 2 #yLight. NL Kitsune: 2 #yWill-o-Wisps (static). NL Fox: 2 #yDark.

WILL-O-WISP.DESCRIPTION: Consumes itself at the end of your turn to deal damage to a random enemy equal to the number of wisps channeled.

SHAPESHIFT.DESCRIPTION: Grants minor base Strength/Dexterity changes. #yAspect cards of that #yShape will trigger.

SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects of that #yShape will trigger. Some relics and powers make your #yShape grant persistent buffs.

ASPECT.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects only trigger when you are in the listed Shape.

LIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Persistent buff. Converted to Block at the start of your turn when over 9 stacks. Opposed to #yDark and will cancel it out before applying.

DARK.DESCRIPTION: Persistent buff. Converted into damaging a random enemy at the start of your turn when over 9 stacks. Opposed to #yLight and will cancel it out before applying.

SHADE.DESCRIPTION: Negates up to that many instances of unblocked damage until next turn and heals you for 2 instead.

Elder.DESCRIPTION: Special cards that can't be smithed but upgrade through 9 tiers based on meeting conditions. Upgrades when anywhere and can only upgrade once per room.

Charm.DESCRIPTION: Will repeat its last chosen action in a manner beneficial to you.

Quickshape.DESCRIPTION: Uncollectable zero-cost cards with Ethereal and Exhaust that change your shape.

Echo.DESCRIPTION: Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
